mapper.sql: resource_config_id, config_num, strategy, resource_pool_id, create_time, modify_time, create_man, modify_man, remark
mapper.select:
select
from resource_config order by config_num asc
select skill_item_id from resource_config_skill where resource_config_id = #{resourceConfigId} and status = 1
select skill_item_id from resource_config_skill where status = 1
SELECT c.customer_id FROM resource_config_ex_cust rc INNER JOIN customer c ON c.app_id = rc.app_id WHERE rc.resource_config_id = #{resourceConfigId}

SELECT count(tt.customer_id) FROM ( SELECT bss.customer_id
,( SELECT count(o.order_id) FROM orders o WHERE o.customer_skill_id = bss.customer_skill_id AND o.skill_type = (select si.skill_type from skill_item si where si.id = bss.skill_item_id) AND o.order_status IN (10, 18, 26, 28) ) AS skillOrdered
FROM `bigv_skill_score` bss INNER JOIN customer_skill csk ON csk.customer_skill_id = bss.customer_skill_id AND csk.skill_status = 1 AND csk.switch_status = 1 AND csk.receive_status = 1
WHERE 1 = 1 AND bss.skill_item_id IN
#{configSkill}
and bss.customer_id NOT IN
#{customerId}
GROUP BY bss.customer_id ) tt
where tt.skillOrdered=0

SELECT tt.customer_id as customerId, tt.customer_skill_id as customerSkillId FROM ( SELECT bss.customer_id, bss.customer_skill_id, bss.skill_item_id, sum(bss.score_total) as scoreTotal
,(SELECT count(o.order_id) FROM orders o WHERE o.customer_skill_id = bss.customer_skill_id AND o.skill_type = (select si.skill_type from skill_item si where si.id = bss.skill_item_id) AND o.order_status IN (10, 18, 26, 28) ) AS skillOrdered
FROM `bigv_skill_score` bss INNER JOIN customer_skill csk ON csk.customer_skill_id = bss.customer_skill_id AND csk.skill_status = 1 AND csk.switch_status = 1 AND csk.receive_status = 1
WHERE bss.skill_item_id IN
#{configSkill}
and bss.customer_id NOT IN
#{customerId}
GROUP BY bss.customer_id
ORDER BY skillOrdered asc, scoreTotal DESC
ORDER BY scoreTotal DESC
LIMIT #{beginIndex},#{endIndex} ) tt
where tt.skillOrdered=0
ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1

SELECT t.customer_id as customerId, t.customer_skill_id as customerSkillId FROM( SELECT pc.customer_id, csk.customer_skill_id
,(SELECT count(o.order_id) FROM orders o WHERE o.customer_skill_id = csk.customer_skill_id AND o.skill_type = (select si.skill_type from skill_item si where si.id = csk.skill_item_id) AND o.order_status IN (10, 18, 26, 28) ) AS skillOrdered
FROM resource_pool_customer pc INNER JOIN customer_skill csk ON csk.customer_id = pc.customer_id AND csk.skill_status = 1 AND csk.skill_item_id IN
#{configSkill}
AND csk.switch_status = 1 AND csk.receive_status = 1
WHERE pc.resource_pool_id = #{resourcePoolId}
and pc.customer_id NOT IN
#{customerId}
AND pc.`status` = 1 ) t
where t.skillOrdered = 0
ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1

SELECT bss.customer_id as customerId, bss.customer_skill_id as customerSkillId, bss.skill_item_id as skillItemId, csk.skill_name as skillName, csk.discount_price as discountPrice, csk.service_unit as serviceUnit, csc.skill_voice_url as skillVoiceUrl, csc.skill_voice_time as skillVoiceTime, si.back_color as skillBackColor, si.home_black_color as skillHomeBackColor, si.font_color as skillFontColor, c.nick_name as customerNickName, c.sex as customerSex, c.birthday as customerBirthday, bss.score_total ,(SELECT count(o.order_id) FROM orders o WHERE o.customer_skill_id = bss.customer_skill_id AND o.skill_type = (select si.skill_type from skill_item si where si.id = bss.skill_item_id) AND o.order_status IN (10, 18, 26, 28) ) AS skillOrdered FROM bigv_skill_score bss INNER JOIN customer_skill csk ON csk.customer_skill_id = bss.customer_skill_id AND csk.skill_status = 1
LEFT JOIN customer_skill_certify csc ON csc.certify_id = csk.certify_id LEFT JOIN skill_item si ON si.id = bss.skill_item_id LEFT JOIN customer c ON c.customer_id = bss.customer_id WHERE bss.skill_item_id = #{skillItemId} ORDER BY skillOrdered ASC, bss.score_total DESC LIMIT 0, 4
